class.rdfs:comment: A point value or interval for product characteristics and other purposes.
class.rdfs:label: QuantitativeValue

schema:additionalProperty.rdfs:comment:
A property-value pair representing an additional characteristics of the entitity, e.g. a product feature or another characteristic for which there is no matching property in schema.org.

Note: Publishers should be aware that applications designed to use specific schema.org properties (e.g. http://schema.org/width, http://schema.org/color, http://schema.org/gtin13, ...) will typically expect such data to be provided using those properties, rather than using the generic property/value mechanism.
schema:additionalProperty.rdfs:label: additionalProperty

schema:maxValue.rdfs:comment: The upper value of some characteristic or property.
schema:maxValue.rdfs:label: maxValue

schema:minValue.rdfs:comment: The lower value of some characteristic or property.
schema:minValue.rdfs:label: minValue

schema:unitCode.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL. Other codes than the UN/CEFACT Common Code may be used with a prefix followed by a colon.
schema:unitCode.rdfs:label: unitCode

schema:unitText.rdfs:comment: A string or text indicating the unit of measurement. Useful if you cannot provide a standard unit code for unitCode.
schema:unitText.rdfs:label: unitText

schema:value.rdfs:comment:
The value of the quantitative value or property value node.

  • For QuantitativeValue and MonetaryAmount, the recommended type for values is 'Number'.
  • For PropertyValue, it can be 'Text;', 'Number', 'Boolean', or 'StructuredValue'.
  • Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similiar Unicode symbols.
  • Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.
schema:value.rdfs:label: value

schema:valueReference.rdfs:comment: A pointer to a secondary value that provides additional information on the original value, e.g. a reference temperature.
schema:valueReference.rdfs:label: valueReference
